title: Mastering Reading Comprehension
description: Learn strategies to read faster and understand more, from news articles to academic texts.
info:
Course Info

Reading isn't just about recognizing words; it's about efficient processing. This course covers essential strategies like skimming for main ideas and scanning for specific details.

quiz.question: When scanning a text, what are you looking for?
quiz.correctFeedback: Correct! Scanning is like using a search function with your eyes to find specific data.
quiz.incorrectFeedback: Not quite. Finding the main idea is usually done by skimming.
